titleStmt.title: A discourse of the general notions of money, trade & exchanges, as they stand in relation to each other attempted by way of aphorism : with a letter to a minister of state, further explaining the aphorisms, and applying them to the present circumstances of this nation : wherein also some thoughts are suggested for the remedying the abuses of our money / by a merchant.
titleStmt.author: Clement, Simon.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
